programme.title: Nass El Houma
programme.desc: The series tells the story of residents of a rural neighborhood in the city of Casablanca, who used to live a quiet life, until the day when they learn that their neighborhood will be demolished by an investor to build a modern shopping center.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, Roland Deschain fights with everything he has to prevent his enemy, the Man in Black, from bringing down a structure that preserves reality. With the Man in Black trying to use psychic children to unleash darkness, Roland takes one of them in to save both him and the world.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: When a depressed Spencer starts fiddling with the broken Jumanji game in search of purpose, his friends reenter the game to rescue him, along with his grandfather and his old friend. As they encounter a landscape ravaged by drought, they must fight to find Spencer and save Jumanji.

programme.title: I Will Find You a Better Home
programme.desc: A real estate company's core talent, Miss Fang, gets moved by the boss to a Shanghai shop, where she shares management duties with Mr. Xu. Meanwhile, the shop employees must carefully get along with the two managers because of their completely different management philosophies.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahasse, Wichita, and Little Rock move to the heart of America where they face surviving zombies, as well as the growing pains of the cynical substitute family.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: In1969 LA, the career of the once-famed actor Rick Dalton is put on the line due to his alcoholism, along with that of his stunt double, Cliff Booth. The two aspire to find some fame and success in the film industry just as the Manson Family plots their most infamous crime.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: One of the countless symbiotes that have invaded Earth, an alien creature, bonds with a failed reporter. However, the creature grows fond of Earth and chooses to defend it.

In Laila’s story, she is an undergraduate whose family depends on her father’s small income, and she seldom sees her married siblings. A third story is about Bothayna and Salah who are happily married with a son, but are parted when Salah gets shot while chasing smugglers.

programme.title: Harem Al-Shawish
programme.desc: The series revolves around the love of money and power and how the simple and complicated social issues are resolved. It also discusses the things that disturb the lives of people who bring out evil and good in other people's lives.

programme.title: Dirty Laundry
programme.desc: The lives of the wealthiest and most influential families in Istanbul, and their maids frequently become a part of their stories after being exposed to the mysteries, secrets, and murders kept behind closed doors.

programme.desc: The widow Sarah resorts to her only remaining option to cover the costs of her son Ibrahim's cancer treatment, so she agrees to spend one night with the manager of the company, Zain, in return for an amount of money.

programme.desc: Firat is an accomplished federal prosecutor. As he loses his memory and ends up imprisoned after he gets charged with killing his wife and daughter, he must break out of prison in order to find out the truth.

programme.desc: Majid is a young headmaster in a private school, seeking to make some changes at his school, and his life as well; he has no idea that his wish will come true when he bumps into Layal, who works as a dog trainer and a musician in a restaurant.

programme.title: Govinda Naam Mera

programme.title: RamLeela
programme.desc: A retelling of Romeo and Juliet where a man from a crime family falls for a girl from a family who wants to wed her to another man. What follows is a set of dramatic events, with love and lust at the heart.

programme.title: Nill Battey Sannata
programme.desc: Appu is a tenth-grade student, who wants to quit attending classes because her mother can't pay for her higher studies. Her mother enrolled her for maths tuition, but Appu thinks that only wealthy children become doctors or engineers, and that she will end up being a maid like her mother.

programme.title: Man's Shadow (Ep26)
programme.desc: Drama, Thriller 2021 Jalal's quiet life turns into hell when his daughter Shahed is subjected to a violent incident and seeks to uncover the truth and reveal the perpetrator's identity for revenge. Yasser Galal, Nermin Alfky, Mahmoud Abdel Moghni, Nour, Ehab Fahmy, Ahmed Abd Alfattah, Ahmed Saleh

programme.title: Bab Al-Hara 3
programme.desc: The tale of the revolutionary struggles of the people continues. The neighborhood is shocked by Abu Issam's sudden departure. A new doctor, Ibn Al-Baghgaty, arrives in the neighborhood, showing his skill in treating incurable diseases.

programme.title: Forty-ish At His 20s (Ep18)
programme.desc: Drama, People, Comedy 2022 Fahd wakes up from a long coma. Later, he discovers that twenty years are taken away from his life, making him dead in the eyes of people, even his closest ones. Abdullah Alsadhan, Shaima Sabt, Ahmed Shoeib, Maha Abdullah, Mariam Al Ghamdi, Bandar Bajaba, Ily F. Habib, Sherif Badr Al din

programme.title: My Name Is Farah
programme.desc: Farah fled Iran and is now employed illegally as a cleaner in Istanbul. Her life is turned upside down when she witnesses a murder at work, preventing her from traveling to France to care for her ill son. She then makes an attempt to flee from the criminals after they identify her.

programme.title: Haroun's Mother (Ep28)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2020 A woman suffers from a lot of problems when she converts to Judaism in a society overwhelmed with racism. Hayat Al Fahed , Mohamed Gaber, Ahmed Al Jasmy , Abdel Mohsen Al Nemr, Soaad Ali, Faghriya Khamis, Fouad Ali, Mohamed Jamal Al Adl, Muhammad Shams

programme.title: Salon Zahra
programme.desc: When wrong chairs arrive to Zahra Salon from a furniture store, things take a turn as inside these chairs are smuggled dollars, which leads Anas, the owner of the furniture store, to enter the neighborhood to get the money.

programme.title: She Looks Great (Ep36)
programme.desc: Drama, Bollywood, Romance 2021 Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Jyoti Tiwari, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Del Ragel
programme.desc: When his daughter Shahd is injured in a violent accident, the life of Galal turns upside down. Dr. Malak sympathizes with his crisis, as she tries to help him seek the justice that his daughter is due and to get out of his ordeal.

programme.title: Ghamam's Island (Ep26)
programme.desc: Romance, Thriller, History, Fantasy, Drama 2022 Everything turns upside down on Ghamam Island when Shiekh Madien gives the sins note to his follower before his death, a drowned body by coincidence is discovered, and a gypsy shows up in the village. Tareq Lotfy, Fathy Abd Alwahab, Mai Ezz Al Din, Ahmed Amin, Wafaa Amer, Mohamed Gom`aa, Riyad Al Khouly, Hussein El Menbawy, Abdel Rahim Kamal

programme.title: Arbeeny Fy el Eshreen
programme.desc: Fahd wakes up after a coma that lasted nearly twenty years and finds himself at the age of forty. He tries to remember and learn everything he has missed. He is surprised by his wife's (Ahd) divorce from him, and her closeness to his cousin Saleh. He finds himself at a crossroads, either to continue alone or to defend his previous life and recover it, whatever the consequences are.

programme.title: Arab Women Sports Tournament
programme.desc: People This tournament consists of eight games, which is basketball, volleyball, table tennis, shooting, athletics, archery, fencing, and show jumping. Milad Youssef, Mona Wasef, Sabah Al Jazaaery, Wael Sharaf, Wafeeq Al Zaeem, Bassam Al Molla, Kamal Morra

programme.title: Bab Al Harah (Ep18)
programme.desc: Drama, Thriller 2009 Grief controls the people living in the district. As a lot of young people where killed in the last battle. programme.desc: Crime, Thriller, Drama 2023 Farah, a 28-year-old Iranian woman, has to stay in Istanbul while fleeing from Iran to France. programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. programme.title: Rayah El Madam
programme.desc: A comic TV series in which Sultan is a commercials director who is addicted to multiple secret relationships which seems to always get him in trouble. He is also challenged by his wife, Dalia's short-term memory loss as she forgets who he is every day. Together with his friend, Bahgat, they set daily plans in motion so he could win his wife's heart and face all his other dilemmas.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Hayya Al Rouh
programme.desc: The story follows an angelic girl named Haya, who, despite her disability, defies all circumstances and insists on confronting them, especially her uncle Mubarak, who left her in the care of her stepfather, Abdul Rahman.

programme.title: End Share 9
programme.desc: After he became wealthy following an unexpected event that took place years ago, Fares finds himself targeted by Adnan and a person close to him.

programme.title: Nassibi w Esmetek 4
programme.desc: An anthology series of various tales from everyday life, including the story, "The White Eyeglasses", that follows Fakhr, who invents a pair of glasses that, when worn, can tell you how others truly feel about you underneath the lies and niceties.
